issue.title: Fix java warnings emitted by java compiler
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-101](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-101). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Java compiler emits several warnings regarding the use of rawtypes and unclosed resources on a few classes.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-101?focusedCommentId=15283610) by Laurent Goujon (laurent):*
pull request: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/60

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-101?focusedCommentId=15403037) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 60
